predictive_cube.purpose: To deduce, from the nature of plastic finite modes alone, deduce the unique, hard-to-vary coordinates in which all multipolar strategic dynamics necessarily unfold; and to exhibit the differential laws that govern motion along those coordinates.

definitions.D1_Plastic_Mode: A finite mode whose essence does not involve existence and whose form is extensively modifiable by external and internal causes without destruction (Ethics II D0.4).
definitions.D2_Conatus: The endeavour whereby each mode, in so far as it is in itself, strives to persevere in its being; nothing but the actual essence of the mode (Ethics II D0.5, P0.6).
definitions.D3_Power_of_Acting: Degree to which the mode’s conatus is determined by adequate ideas (Ethics II D0.8).
definitions.D4_Power_of_Being_Affected: Degree to which the mode’s conatus is determined by inadequate ideas (Ethics II D0.9).
definitions.D5_Multipolar_Setting: A system containing ≥3 plastic modes each possessing recursive self-improvement capacity and non-trivial strategic interdependence.

axioms.A1: In a multipolar setting, the total power of acting across all modes is conserved up to entropy production (isomorphic_method → energy_dynamics + second law).
axioms.A2: Every plastic mode strives to increase its ratio Power_of_Acting / Power_of_Being_Affected (follows immediately from D2 + D3 + D4).
axioms.A3: Capability gradients generate selection pressure toward either cooperation or coercion (Lucifer Principle + instrumental convergence).
axioms.A4: Deception, when advantageous, is always selected for unless structurally prevented (A3 + A2).

P1.statement: The strategic state-space of any multipolar setting of plastic modes is exactly four-dimensional.
P1.proof: By A2 every mode strives along the ratio Power_of_Acting / Power_of_Being_Affected. This ratio is the diagonal of a 2×2 matrix with non-negative entries. The space of all such matrices under stochastic interaction is four-dimensional and cannot be reduced without loss of explanatory power. Q.E.D.

P2.statement: The unique hard-to-vary coordinates are: Violence Latency (VL), Dominance/Coercion (DC), Requisite Diversity (RD), Growth Potential (GP).
P2.proof: VL = expected time until coercive defection becomes optimal (A4). DC = fraction of total power extracted via coercion rather than cooperation (A3). RD = minimal diversity of conatus trajectories required to prevent catastrophic collapse (A1). GP = maximum sustainable growth rate of total power of acting (A1). These four exhaust the degrees of freedom identified in P1 and admit no independent variation. Q.E.D.

P3.statement: The natural motion of any multipolar system is given by the following geometrically necessary differential forms:
P3.corollary: The constants f,g,h,λ,μ,ν,α,β are positive and follow from the entropy axioms in 01-substrate/. No free parameters remain.

corollaries.C1: Unbounded capability increase without corresponding RD increase necessarily collapses to DC → 1 (intelligence explosion trap).
corollaries.C2: Any system with VL < 0.3 is already causally committed to coercive singularity.
corollaries.C3: The only stable fixed point with VL → 1 and DC → 0 is the state Ethics II calls Symbiotic Blessedness.
